T02TD2762E:139b-0: @139b * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dka' thub can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2762E:139b-2: dka' thub chen po dka' thub mnyes //
T02TD2762E:139b-3: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2762E:139b-4: 'dir 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dad pa thob pa'i skye bo sran thub par nams kyis /
T02TD2762E:139b-5: dus dang cho ga'i khyad par la ma ltos par shin tu myur du 'gro ba bskyab par 'dod pas /
T02TD2762E:140a-0: zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bdun gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das drang @140a * //
T02TD2762E:140a-1: srong chen po dka' thub yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2762E:140a-2: 'jig rten dbang phyug drang srong che //
T02TD2762E:140a-3: mya ngan med pa'i sdong bu'i 'gram /
T02TD2762E:140a-4: ri dags stan can dka' thub tshal //
T02TD2762E:140a-5: rgyan spangs nying rjes gdungs pa bsgom //
T02TD2762E:140a-6: mgon po'i rten ni gang yang rung //
T02TD2762E:140a-7: ye shes ldan de der bcug mdun //
T02TD2762E:140a-8: phongs pa dag ni mya ngan gyi //
T02TD2762E:140a-9: cha byad kyis smad khas phub 'dug / lag pa gnyis ni 'gram brten cing /
T02TD2762E:140a-10: mi ro bzhin du rkang brkyang pa //
T02TD2762E:140a-11: bza' btung spangs dang gos bral dang //
T02TD2762E:140a-12: mchims gdong khe bas smre sngags brjod //
T02TD2762E:140a-13: spyod lam gnyis te 'gro ldog dang //
T02TD2762E:140a-14: ring du zag pa dor pa'o //
T02TD2762E:140a-15: de bzhin ngag gnyis smre sngags bsngags //
T02TD2762E:140a-16: sems pa yang ni gnyis nyid de //
T02TD2762E:140a-17: snying rjes skye bo bsgral ba dang //
T02TD2762E:140a-19: ji ste smra ba la mngon par dga' ba zhig na sngags kyi dam tshig kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2762E:140a-20: na ma: shr'i lo kya n'a th'a ya /
T02TD2762E:140a-21: bo dhi satva ma h'a satva ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD2762E:140a-22: m'a ma ta mu ke ma h'a du:kha kle sha sarba a'a ba ra na kha se kha se me kha se me phat phat /
T02TD2762E:140a-23: ma ma sh'i ghram aa nu gra ha aa nu gra ha h'um h'um /
T02TD2762E:140a-24: yid la byed pa gzhan btang ste //
T02TD2762E:140a-25: lha mchog sems pa gcig pu yis //
T02TD2762E:140a-26: skye bo nyon mongs gzir 'di dag / zhi bar bya phyir smyung bar gnas //
T02TD2762E:140a-27: yun ring phan pa'i don mthong nas //
T02TD2762E:140a-28: cung zad bde ba ci dgar rung //
T02TD2762E:140a-29: sems can tshogs mang don du ni //
T02TD2762E:140a-30: bdag gis dka' thub bzod par byos //
T02TD2762E:140a-31: bag med lus dang sems 'di ni //
T02TD2762E:140a-32: gnod par byed kyis phan mi byed //
T02TD2762E:140a-33: de ring dka' thub spyad pa yis //
T02TD2762E:140a-34: lus can kun gyi don sgrub bo //
T02TD2762E:140a-35: ji ltar dgra bo khros pa la'ang //
T02TD2762E:140a-36: thal spyar snying rje skye 'gyur na //
T02TD2762E:140a-37: thugs rje che mnga' 'gro don sdod //
T02TD2762E:140a-38: bdag la ji ltar gzigs mi 'gyur //
T02TD2762E:140a-39: de ltar bstan pa bzod ldan pas //
T02TD2762E:140a-40: nyin 'ga' smyung bar spyod na de //
T02TD2762E:140a-41: dngos dang gzugs brnyan rmi lam du //
T02TD2762E:140a-43: thugs rje chen po dka' thub can gyi sgrub thams rdzogs so//
